title: Have Fun
body:
You can make a lot of fun
You can make a lot of things
You can make a lot of wishes
‘cause we are happy people
And we live in the free world

Come and sing a song with me
And we can have fun
Come and build your hope with me
And we can have fun

You can make a lot of fun
You can make a lot of things
You can make a lot of wishes
‘cause we are happy people
And we live in the free world

Come and sing a song with me
And we can have fun
Come and build your hope with me
And we can have fun
